item.title: About
item.description:
About me

My name is Jarry Wang.

I’m from China, born in 1994. I lived in Shanghai during my childhood, and studied German and finance in Zhejiang University.

I’m currently living and working in Canton, CN.

Forex Trader

As a self-employed forex trader, I’m working on a quantitative trading project called Cornucopia. I have worked as a forex trader since March 2015, and focus on EURUSD and XAUUSD. After building Cornucopia from Sep 2016, I started learning programming, mostly Python, and became interested in Data Science.

Photography Amateur

Maybe I’m not a qualified photographer, but I’m keen on taking photos. I bought my first camera Sony Nex5 in April, 2014. After taking thousands of photos in these two years, I bought a Fuji x100s. Although I usually take street snapshots, I’m also interested in Portrait, Food and Architecture.

My favorite photographers are Martin Parr, Vivian Maier, Jeff Wall, Marc Riboud, Ueda Shoji, Lv Nan, and Bernard Faucon. Here is my portfolio.

Contact

e-mail: jarrywangcn@outlook.com

About this site

This is where I post articles and thoughts on anything that springs to mind. Mostly on Programming, Photography, Anthropology, Travel and people around me.

  • Generated using Hugo, a fast and modern static website engine.
  • Hosted from my Github repository.
  • Theme is build by Yoshiharu Yamashita
